title: Don't Starve
gameDescription: Includes the base game and Season Pass featuring all-new content. Explore Croft Manor in the new “Blood Ties” story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in “Lara’s Nightmare”. Survive extreme conditions with a friend in the new online Co-Op Endurance mode, and brave the new “Extreme Survivor” difficulty. Also features an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and 5 classic Lara skins. Existing DLC will challenge you to explore a new tomb that houses an ancient terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, and combat waves of infected predators in Cold Darkness Awakened.

title: Control
gameDescription: Join Link in this high-flying adventure to save Zelda. Master the sword and solve puzzles in this classic tale of good versus evil. Take to the skies and explore a vast world full of dungeons and secrets.

title: Life is Strange
gameDescription: Dive into the futuristic world of Night City, where your choices shape the story. Customize your character, hack into systems, and engage in high-octane combat in this open-world RPG.

title: Genshin Impact
gameDescription: Battle your way out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler. Wield powerful weapons and abilities, encounter gods and monsters, and uncover the secrets of the Greek pantheon.

title: Far Cry: Primal
gameDescription: Step into the shoes of Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter searching for his adopted daughter. Explore a rich, open world, make tough decisions, and battle dangerous foes in this epic RPG.

title: Valorant
gameDescription: Play with 4-10 players online or via local WiFi as you attempt to prepare your spaceship for departure, but beware as one or more random players among the crew are impostors bent on killing everyone!

title: Sea of Thieves
gameDescription: Escape to a deserted island and create your own paradise as you explore, create, and customize in the Animal Crossing series. Your island getaway has a wealth of natural resources that can be used to craft everything from tools to creature comforts.

title: Watch Dogs 2
gameDescription: The legendary Halo series returns with the most expansive Master Chief campaign yet. Explore the expansive ringworld, engage in intense combat, and discover the secrets of the Halo universe.

title: Gta: SA
gameDescription: Build the farm of your dreams in this farming simulator. Grow crops, raise animals, fish, and build relationships with the townspeople in Pelican Town. There’s always something new to discover.

title: Naraka : Bladepoint
gameDescription: Experience the epic tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland. Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are outlaws on the run. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal, and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive.
